bio:
Self-taught art photographer.
Creator of the Lonely Houses ✨🏠✨
Lisbon, Portugal 🇵🇹
.
My science channel:

list.comment:
[ the seat of consciousness ✨🏠✨ ]
.
In my ongoing work I am drawing inspiration from how neuroscience, cognitive science and psychology and philosophy have dealt with finding out where and how our memories are stored. Stay tuned for snippets of how this inspiration will get translated into visuals.
.
.
#sejkko_lonelyhouses
.

[consequence or choice?]
.
As Carl Jung said, “I am not what happened to me. I am what I choose to become.”
.
Isn’t it crazy how some quotes we have known forever suddenly appear fuller with meaning as we grow, transcend and evolve?
.
My path at present is full of releasing negativity, forgiving those who have hurt me - fully, and re training my thoughts to be attuned to what really matters.
.
The more that happens, the more i feel I am me. And I know this because I am having feelings I remember from my childhood.
.
I now realise those early feelings and visions came at the time to become the reminders of who i truly am in times when the world would be very confusing and hard to navigate from the truth of the heart.
.
.
🏠
.
.

[ when sometimes placing our hand on our heart reminds us that emotion travels much faster than light ✨ ]
.
.
.
✨💖✨
.
#sejkko_lonelyhouses
.
.

[ 4: a moment in time ⏰ ]
.
Three challenges done, now we come to one of my personal favourites: capture scenes where the universe comes into an ephemeral moment - come and gone. Birds, people dancing, a beach ball flying. Take your pick, be creative, be minimalistic, and colourful. Show me your best shots using the link in my bio. You already know the amazing prizes you can win.
.
.
Três desafios já foram, agora chegamos a um dos meus preferidos: capturar cenas onde o universo entra num momento efêmero, que vem e rapidamente já foi. Pássaros, pessoas dançando, uma bola de praia voando. Um instante no tempo. Faz a tua escolha, ativa ao máximo a tua criatividade, pensa de forma minimalista e colorida. Transmite uma mensagem. Mostra-me tuas melhores fotos usando o link na minha biografia. já conheces os incríveis prémios que podes ganhar!
.
.
.
.
#sparkarenaissance
#despertardorenascimento
#huaweinextimage
#huaweip20pro
#ad

One of my favourite Lisbon views ✨💖✨
.
.
#lisbonliving
#tbt
.
.

[ all views are welcome 🏤💒🏢 ]
.
This last week I came across many situations that reminded me of how important it is to listen, and to give different points of view time and attention. Also realised how important it is for us not to hide behind a keyboard or a mobile phone when expressing how we feel and what we think.
.
Giving time, attention and brains to the world is harder that just reacting to it, but I believe that time and energy pay back by making us all more real and more present.
.
What are your views?
.
Have a great weekend 💖
.
.

[ wide horizons ✨🌅🌊✨ ]
.
🇬🇧 : If you know me, you’ll know this beach is close to my heart. It is my sanctuary. I have been showing this place to you for years. Always the same location, but a different mood, a different insight, a new step of personal and spiritual growth. It had to be this place I used for the last challenge: wide horizons. Go out there and try to fit your entire galaxy into a photo. Bring layers, distance, and make it shine. Use the link in my bio to submit!
.
.
🇵🇹 : Quem me conhece sabe que esta praia e muito importante para mim, é como um santuário onde vou a recarregar baterias. Tinha de ser aqui desde onde anúncio hoje o último desafio: Novos horizontes. Vai lá fora explorar o mundo e tenta meter a tua galáxia inteira numa foto. Procura camadas, distancia, brilho e cor. Usa o link na minha bio para submeter!
.
.
#huaweip20pro
#huaweinextimage
#sparkarenaissance
#ad
.
.

[ the bright side 🏠✨ ]
.
It is not always obvious- the bright side we all want to see. It is often quietly whispering on the periphery of our everyday. Sometimes the many voices inside our head keep our eyes away from it. If we send those voices away, quietly, for a little while, we may find that all we need is right here with us.
.
.
#sejkko_lonelyhouses
.
.

[ beautiful awareness ✨] lately my senses have been very tuned to the little things that make the universe be full of life. The moisture in the soil, the osmotic movements inside roots, the pores on leaf surfaces that enable photosynthesis, the breeze. All those things.
.
But also, I could not help noticing the sudden arrival of autumn. It was like from one moment to the next. One day 38c the next 17c. Well well hello Autumn!
.
🍂
.
🏠
.
#sejkko_lonelyhouses
.

[ colour blast 🌈 before the ☔️ ]
.
If you are in Lisbon you will know what I am talking about. We went from schorchio-summer to winter in like no time at all. But in the short in-between, the vibrancy of colour was briefly hypernatural 💖
.
.

[ the Alpine sunset breeze ✨ ]
.
This b-side from my Debut project has been around waiting for printing tests and all. My recent Fernwehallein project took over. Now as I am about to embark in my next project I thought it was only fair to release this piece into the world. The story of this house has to do with the sensation of a strong, yet gentle and deeply invigorating alpine breeze. Sunset oxygen - we all enjoy it in our core, in our own specific way.
.
.
C-type 50x40cm - limited edition of 25.
.
#sejkko_lonelyhouses
.
.
